mdRecord.dcterms:title: La decoration dhumaine nature, & aornement des dames / Compile & extraict des tresexcellens docteurs & plus expers medicins, tant anciēs que modernes, par maistre Andre le Fournier, docteur regent en la faculte de Medicine, en luniuersite de Paris, nouuellemēt corrige & imprime
Decoration dhumaine nature, et aornement des dames
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bedford, Francis, 1799-1883
Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
Juste, Françoys, active 16th century
Le Fournier, André, -1533
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: On les vend a Lyon, en la maison de Frācoys Juste ...
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Title within ornamental border, with "La decoration dhumaine nature" repeated above the top of the border.
Colophon dated: le xxvii iour de Juing Mil cinq cens trente & sept.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: F. Bedford. Unidentified monogram bookplate of "EM" or "ME." Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 715.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Cosmetics--Early works to 1800.
